## EditorApi.setLineNumbers() method

Set whether or not line numbers are shown to the left of the editor ui

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setLineNumbers(lineNumbers: boolean): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type |
|  --- | --- |
|  lineNumbers | boolean |
